import React from 'react'; class About extends React.Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.state={ orderName:"", orderPhone:"", orderEmail:"", orderAddress:"" } } hanldeInput =(e)=>{ this.setState({[e.target.name]: e.target.value}) } render(){ return(
this.hanldeInput(e)}>

) } } export default About;
